attributes.action: Create a national Child & Family Social Services charter and enforce it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ...through independent criminal investigations into any and all allegations of malpractice, professional neglect, affray, extortion, coercion, duress and all other forms of behaviour not conducive to maintaining family units. Too many families have been forcibly separated for no good reason and often illegally (example: children removed by force - which is abduction of a minor and should be prosecuted as such), which causes untold and irreversible mental anguish and often leads to suicide of parent and/or minor.
